snippet: Oliver Luckett and his social media start-up, theAudience, offer celebrities a chance to build armies of fans across the likes of Facebook, Twitter, YouTube and Google Plus.
abstract: Oliver Luckett and his social media start-up, theAudience, offer celebrities a chance to build armies of fans across the likes of Facebook, Twitter, YouTube and Google Plus; site publishes thousands of items monthly on behalf of about 300 clients, reaching total of 800 million fans.
lead_paragraph: Oliver Luckett and his social media start-up, theAudience, offer celebrities a chance to build armies of fans across the likes of Facebook, Twitter, YouTube and Google Plus.

headline.seo: Oliver Luckett of theAudience, Building Online Fan Bases
headline.print_headline: Hey, A-List, Meet Your Online Megaphone
